title: Search results from google search bar in pixel 2 show in different language
content:
I have tried searching in assistant language settings. They point to settings for voice search. Not for search results when you type your search queries in the Google search bar in pixel home


I have shown highlighted text shows in some non English language. How do I revert it back to English 

screen.

If I open chrome browser in pixel phone and search there. I don't have this issue there.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
